IIntegralImage

Interface to an integral image (see https://​en​.wikipedia​.org​/wiki​/Summed-area_table)

GetSum
virtual uint32 GetSum(
int channel,
int x1,
int y1,
int x2,
int y2
) = 0

Returns the sum of the requested area

Parameters
channel
int

which color channel to sum

x1
int

top left corner's X coordinate (in pixel coordinates)

y1
int

top left corner's Y coordinate (in pixel coordinates)

x2
int

y2
int

bottom right corner's Y coordinate (in pixel coordinates)
